scripts.env:check:milesweb: node -e "require('dotenv').config(); const req=['DATABASE_URL']; const optSecret=['SESSION_SECRET','NEXTAUTH_SECRET','AUTH_SECRET']; const missing=req.filter(k=>!process.env[k]); const hasSecret=optSecret.some(k=>Boolean(process.env[k])); if(missing.length||!hasSecret){ console.error('Missing required env vars: '+[...missing,...(!hasSecret?['SESSION_SECRET (or NEXTAUTH_SECRET/AUTH_SECRET)']:[])].join(', ')); process.exit(1) } console.log('MilesWeb env check passed')"
scripts.build: npm run prisma:generate && npm run build:css
scripts.build:milesweb: npm run env:check:milesweb && npm run build
